title: How to get really good at social studies - Quora

response.answer_text: Social studies is actually a really easy subject ,  Here's 5 ways in which you can get really good at it - 1.Read a lot ! - read all you can , read all your school textbooks , guides etc . Make sure you do pre-reading before the chapter is thought in class , ex. If your teacher says she is going to teach french Revolution , then read the entire chapter of French Revolution before it is taught in class. This way you can stay informed and better prepared than the rest of your peers also you can answer the questions easily.  2. Current affairs - Social studies and current affairs go hand in hand . So stay updated with what is going on around the world and connect it with what you have learned in social studies . This helps you correlate and help better understand .ex- when you read newspapers about elections being held in your country , correlate it with what you have learnt in politics. 3. Develop an interest - social studies is interesting , it has a wide range of topics like history, economics , politics etc . So it is better to develop an interest in this subject, which will help you in being good at it. 4. Watch crash courses - youtube is filled with a lot of videos explaining many social studies concepts and they are not necessarily long , they can be as short as 5 minutes . they are compact and contain all the information from the chapter . watching them can help you visualize everything as these videos are supported with pictures and animations. check out the crashcourse and john d ruddy channels on youtube.  check out my answer on why we should study social studies- Faheem Farooq's answer to Why is the study of social studies important?
